mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfGodFitLktbCnnc Generator(Generator) 2019-11-15 */ FIT_LKTB_CNNC_NO , FIT_LKTB_HTML , MOBILE_FIT_LKTB_HTML , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM INF_GOD_FIT_LKTB_CNNC WHERE 1 = 1 AND FIT_LKTB_CNNC_NO = #{fitLktbCnncNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteInfGodFitLktbCnnc Generator(Generator) 2019-11-15 */ FROM INF_GOD_FIT_LKTB_CNNC WHERE 1 = 1 AND FIT_LKTB_CNNC_NO = #{fitLktbCnncNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
